org.apache.ignite.ml.selection.scoring.metric

Interface Metric<L,C extends EvaluationContext<L,C>,A extends MetricStatsAggregator<L,C,A>>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - Type of label.
    C - Type of evaluation context.
    A - Type of statistics aggregator.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Accuracy, BalancedAccuracy, BinaryClassificationMetric, FallOut, FalseNegativeAbsoluteValue, FalsePositiveAbsoluteValue, Fdr, FMeasure, Mae, MissRate, Mse, Npv, Precision, R2, Recall, Rmse, Rss, Specificity, TrueNegativeAbsoluteValue, TruePositiveAbsoluteValue

    public interface Metric<L,C extends EvaluationContext<L,C>,A extends MetricStatsAggregator<L,C,A>>
extends Serializable
    This class represents a container with computed value of metric and it provides a factory for metric statistics aggregation class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metric<L,C,A> initBy(A aggr)
      Initializes metric value by statistics aggregator.
      A makeAggregator()
      Creates statistics aggregator.
      MetricName name()
      Returns metric name.
      double value()
      Returns metric value.
